name: Chorebusters
description:
Help Fuko - the lazy kid - do the chores or his mom will whoop his ass

How to play:

-> Use W S A D to move

-> SPACE to pick and throw stuff

-> Finish all the chores to win the level

-> If Fuko's energy when out, you lose the game

-> Use the Mop to create a water path that later you can slide on (it does not cost any energy)

-> Have fun with the game
